archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: HORiCe
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Uses BRSS (copy of BRDB) to support enquiries for support personnel. Database is 15 mins behind BRDB. Access has been provided to Horice to many POL staff (Fraud/Help desks etc.) to support queries / investigations
Available on the Internet here:
https://horice.horizonng.com/HORIce/logon.jsp
